data.title: B Main to B Site Post Plant Snake Bite
data.description: A good Snake Bite lineup to play post plant and delay the defuse.

data.title: A Main to A Site Post Plant Snake Bite
data.description: A good Snake Bite lineup to use during post plant and when enemies tap the Spike.

data.title: B Site One Way Smoke for Defender Spawn
data.description: This smoke allows you to see the feet of anyone pushing through the CT door to B Site.
